  • Xu et al. (2020) Xiao Xu, Fang Dong, Yanghua Li, Shaojian He, and Xin Li. Contextual-bandit based personalized recommendation with time-varying user interests. In Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, volume 34, pp.  6518–6525, 2020.
  • Yu et al. (2017) Xiaotian Yu, Michael R Lyu, and Irwin King. Cbrap: Contextual bandits with random projection. In Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, volume 31, 2017.
  • Zhang et al. (2024) Xiao Zhang, Ninglu Shao, Zihua Si, Jun Xu, Wenhan Wang, Hanjing Su, and Ji-Rong Wen. Reward imputation with sketching for contextual batched bandits. Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems, 36, 2024.

Appendix A Proof of Theorem 1

For linear bandits using FD, at round t𝑡titalic_t, the sketch matrix 𝑺(t−1)∈ℝl×dsuperscript𝑺𝑡1superscriptℝ𝑙𝑑\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\in\mathbb{R}^{l\times d}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l × italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is utilized, and a new row 𝒙tsubscript𝒙𝑡\bm{x}_{t}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is received, where l𝑙litalic_l denotes the sketch size. Let 𝚺=𝔼⁢[𝒙t⁢𝒙t⊤]𝚺𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡top\bm{\Sigma}=\mathbb{E}[\bm{x}_{t}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}]bold_Σ = blackboard_E [ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] be the covariance matrix of the arms, and let λisubscript𝜆𝑖\lambda_{i}italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the i𝑖iitalic_i-th eigenvalue of 𝚺𝚺\bm{\Sigma}bold_Σ. By definition, 𝒙tsubscript𝒙𝑡\bm{x}_{t}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT follows the distribution 𝒙t=𝒂isubscript𝒙𝑡subscript𝒂𝑖\bm{x}_{t}=\bm{a}_{i}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with probability λisubscript𝜆𝑖\lambda_{i}italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, where 𝒂isubscript𝒂𝑖\bm{a}_{i}bold_italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is the i𝑖iitalic_i-th vector of 𝑨𝑨\bm{A}bold_italic_A.

We first consider the expected value of the shrinking factor when the sketch is full-rank. If rank⁢(𝑺(t−1))=l−1ranksuperscript𝑺𝑡1𝑙1\text{rank}\left(\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right)=l-1rank ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = italic_l - 1. Let 𝑺(t−1)=𝑼⁢𝚺⁢𝑽superscript𝑺𝑡1𝑼𝚺𝑽\bm{S}^{(t-1)}=\bm{U}\bm{\Sigma}\bm{V}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = bold_italic_U bold_Σ bold_italic_V be the SVD of 𝑺(t−1)superscript𝑺𝑡1\bm{S}^{(t-1)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and 𝒗isubscript𝒗𝑖\bm{v}_{i}bold_italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the i𝑖iitalic_i-th row of 𝑽𝑽\bm{V}bold_italic_V. Denote the set of basis vectors not in the row space of 𝑺(t−1)superscript𝑺𝑡1\bm{S}^{(t-1)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as Wt−1=𝑨\{𝒗1,…,𝒗l−1}subscript𝑊𝑡1\𝑨subscript𝒗1…subscript𝒗𝑙1W_{t-1}=\bm{A}\backslash\{\bm{v}_{1},...,\bm{v}_{l-1}\}italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_A \ { bold_italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }, we have |Wt−1|=r−l+1subscript𝑊𝑡1𝑟𝑙1|W_{t-1}|=r-l+1| italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | = italic_r - italic_l + 1. If 𝒙t∈span⁢(𝒗1,…,𝒗l−1)subscript𝒙𝑡spansubscript𝒗1…subscript𝒗𝑙1\bm{x}_{t}\in\text{span}(\bm{v}_{1},...,\bm{v}_{l-1})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ span ( bold_italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_v start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), we have the shrinking value (σl(t))2=0superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝜎𝑙𝑡20\left(\sigma_{l}^{(t)}\right)^{2}=0( italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = 0; otherwise (σl(t))2=1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝜎𝑙𝑡21\left(\sigma_{l}^{(t)}\right)^{2}=1( italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = 1, with probability ∑ai∈Wt−1λi≥∑i=lrλisubscriptsubscript𝑎𝑖subscript𝑊𝑡1subscript𝜆𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖𝑙𝑟subscript𝜆𝑖\sum_{a_{i}\in W_{t-1}}\lambda_{i}\geq\sum_{i=l}^{r}\lambda_{i}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ italic_W start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, If rank⁢(𝑺(t−1))=l−1ranksuperscript𝑺𝑡1𝑙1\text{rank}(\bm{S}^{(t-1)})=l-1rank ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = italic_l - 1, we have

𝔼⁢[(σl(t))2∣𝑺(t−1)]≥∑i=lrλi.𝔼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝜎𝑙𝑡2superscript𝑺𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑖𝑙𝑟subscript𝜆𝑖\mathbb{E}\left[\left(\sigma_{l}^{(t)}\right)^{2}\mid\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right]\geq% \sum_{i=l}^{r}\lambda_{i}.blackboard_E [ ( italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∣ bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ≥ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

If rank⁢(𝑺(t−1))<l−1ranksuperscript𝑺𝑡1𝑙1\text{rank}\left(\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right)<l-1rank ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) < italic_l - 1, this means that 𝑺(t−1)superscript𝑺𝑡1\bm{S}^{(t-1)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT contains fewer than l−1𝑙1l-1italic_l - 1 distinct vectors drawn from 𝑨𝑨\bm{A}bold_italic_A. Let Iisubscript𝐼𝑖I_{i}italic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the indicator variable for drawing aisubscript𝑎𝑖a_{i}italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT in the first t−1𝑡1t-1italic_t - 1 rounds. Then we have the expected number of distinct vectors at round t−1𝑡1t-1italic_t - 1

𝔼⁢[∑i=1rIi]=∑i=1r(1−(1−λi)t−1).𝔼delimited-[]superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑟subscript𝐼𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑟1superscript1subscript𝜆𝑖𝑡1\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i=1}^{r}I_{i}\right]=\sum_{i=1}^{r}\left(1-(1-\lambda_{i% })^{t-1}\right).blackboard_E [ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - ( 1 - italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Using Markov’s inequality, we have

Prob⁢[r−∑i=1rIi≥r−l+2]≤∑i=1r1−(1−λi)t−1r−l+2≤r⁢(1−λr)t−12.Probdelimited-[]𝑟superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑟subscript𝐼𝑖𝑟𝑙2superscriptsubscript𝑖1𝑟1superscript1subscript𝜆𝑖𝑡1𝑟𝑙2𝑟superscript1subscript𝜆𝑟𝑡12\text{Prob}\left[r-\sum_{i=1}^{r}I_{i}\geq r-l+2\right]\leq\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{r% }1-(1-\lambda_{i})^{t-1}}{r-l+2}\leq\frac{r(1-\lambda_{r})^{t-1}}{2}.Prob [ italic_r - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≥ italic_r - italic_l + 2 ] ≤ divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 1 - ( 1 - italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_r - italic_l + 2 end_ARG ≤ divide start_ARG italic_r ( 1 - italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG .

Note that this is precisely the probability of having fewer than l−1𝑙1l-1italic_l - 1 distinct vectors in the first t−1𝑡1t-1italic_t - 1 rounds. We conclude that for t≥log⁡(rλr)+1𝑡𝑟subscript𝜆𝑟1t\geq\log\left(\frac{r}{\lambda_{r}}\right)+1italic_t ≥ roman_log ( divide start_ARG italic_r end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) + 1, Prob⁢[rank⁢(𝑺t−1)=l−1]≥12Probdelimited-[]ranksubscript𝑺𝑡1𝑙112\text{Prob}\left[\text{rank}(\bm{S}_{t-1})=l-1\right]\geq\frac{1}{2}Prob [ rank ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_l - 1 ] ≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG. This implies that 𝔼⁢[ρt]≥12⁢∑i=lrλi𝔼delimited-[]subscript𝜌𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑖𝑙𝑟subscript𝜆𝑖\mathbb{E}[\rho_{t}]\geq\frac{1}{2}\sum_{i=l}^{r}\lambda_{i}blackboard_E [ italic_ρ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT after an initial logarithmic number of rounds.

Therefore, assuming T≥2⁢log⁡(rλr)𝑇2𝑟subscript𝜆𝑟T\geq 2\log\left(\frac{r}{\lambda_{r}}\right)italic_T ≥ 2 roman_log ( divide start_ARG italic_r end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ), the expected accumulated shrinking value is at least:

𝔼⁢[∑t=1T(σl(t))2]≥T4⁢∑i=lrλi.𝔼delimited-[]superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝜎𝑙𝑡2𝑇4superscriptsubscript𝑖𝑙𝑟subscript𝜆𝑖\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{t=1}^{T}\left(\sigma_{l}^{(t)}\right)^{2}\right]\geq% \frac{T}{4}\sum_{i=l}^{r}\lambda_{i}.blackboard_E [ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ≥ divide start_ARG italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 4 end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = italic_l end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_r end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Note that the accumulated shrinking value is upper-bounded by the spectral loss. According to the regret in equation 6, we conclude that the regret upper bound is Ω⁢(T2)Ωsuperscript𝑇2\Omega\left(T^{2}\right)roman_Ω ( italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) in expectation.

Appendix B Proof of Theorem 2

We begin our proof by considering the number of blocks. Let the entire data stream be denoted as 𝑿⊤=[𝑿0⊤,𝑿1⊤,…,𝑿B⊤]superscript𝑿topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿0topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿1top…superscriptsubscript𝑿𝐵top\bm{X}^{\top}=\left[\bm{X}_{0}^{\top},\bm{X}_{1}^{\top},\dots,\bm{X}_{B}^{\top% }\right]bold_italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = [ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ]. Block i𝑖iitalic_i covers the submatrix 𝑿isubscript𝑿𝑖\bm{X}_{i}bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and stores the corresponding matrix sketch 𝑺isubscript𝑺𝑖\bm{S}_{i}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

According to Invariant 3, each submatrix 𝑿isubscript𝑿𝑖\bm{X}_{i}bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT in block i𝑖iitalic_i contains at least ⌊ϵ⁢l0⌋italic-ϵsubscript𝑙0\lfloor\epsilon l_{0}\rfloor⌊ italic_ϵ italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⌋ rows. Since there are T𝑇Titalic_T rows available for allocation in the entire matrix, the maximum number of blocks is ⌈Tϵ⁢l0⌉𝑇italic-ϵsubscript𝑙0\left\lceil\frac{T}{\epsilon l_{0}}\right\rceil⌈ divide start_ARG italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_ϵ italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ⌉.

When ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ is small, the block length grows exponentially. By Invariant 1, the length of the last active block will be exactly greater than k𝑘kitalic_k, i.e., 2B−1⁢l0≤k≤2B⁢l0superscript2𝐵1subscript𝑙0𝑘superscript2𝐵subscript𝑙02^{B-1}l_{0}\leq k\leq 2^{B}l_{0}2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_k ≤ 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Thus, we take the minimum of the two scenarios to determine the number of blocks, resulting in B=⌈min⁡{log⁡kl0,Tϵ⁢l0}⌉+1𝐵𝑘subscript𝑙0𝑇italic-ϵsubscript𝑙01B=\left\lceil\min\left\{\log\frac{k}{l_{0}},\frac{T}{\epsilon l_{0}}\right\}% \right\rceil+1italic_B = ⌈ roman_min { roman_log divide start_ARG italic_k end_ARG start_ARG italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_ϵ italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG } ⌉ + 1.

For the error guarantee, recall that the error comprises two components: the error from the active block and the error from merging B𝐵Bitalic_B inactive blocks. Given that the streaming sketch can detect the best rank-k𝑘kitalic_k approximation as long as the sketch size exceeds k𝑘kitalic_k, the approximation error in the B𝐵Bitalic_B-th active block is effectively zero.

By maintaining Invariant 3, the size of the i𝑖iitalic_i-th inactive block is bounded by l0⁢ϵsubscript𝑙0italic-ϵl_{0}\epsilonitalic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ϵ. Additionally, the i𝑖iitalic_i-th block employs a streaming matrix sketch with an error parameter of 12i⁢l01superscript2𝑖subscript𝑙0\frac{1}{2^{i}l_{0}}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, thereby ensuring that the maximum error introduced by a sketch at the i𝑖iitalic_i-th block is at most ϵ2iitalic-ϵsuperscript2𝑖\frac{\epsilon}{2^{i}}divide start_ARG italic_ϵ end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG.

Combining all B+1𝐵1B+1italic_B + 1 sketches, we use 𝑺⊤=[𝑺0⊤,𝑺1⊤,…,𝑺B⊤]superscript𝑺topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺0topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺1top…superscriptsubscript𝑺𝐵top\bm{S}^{\top}=\left[\bm{S}_{0}^{\top},\bm{S}_{1}^{\top},\dots,\bm{S}_{B}^{\top% }\right]bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = [ bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] to approximate 𝑿𝑿\bm{X}bold_italic_X. By Lemma 1, this provides the following error guarantee for the entire streaming matrix:

‖𝑿⊤⁢𝑿−𝑺⊤⁢𝑺‖2subscriptnormsuperscript𝑿top𝑿superscript𝑺top𝑺2\displaystyle\left\|\bm{X}^{\top}\bm{X}-\bm{S}^{\top}\bm{S}\right\|_{2}∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X - bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤∑i=0B‖𝑿i⊤⁢𝑿i−𝑺i⊤⁢𝑺i‖2absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖0𝐵subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑖topsubscript𝑿𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖topsubscript𝑺𝑖2\displaystyle\leq\sum_{i=0}^{B}\left\|\bm{X}_{i}^{\top}\bm{X}_{i}-\bm{S}_{i}^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}\right\|_{2}≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=∑i=0B−1‖𝑿i⊤⁢𝑿i−𝑺i⊤⁢𝑺i‖2+‖𝑿B⊤⁢𝑿B−𝑺B⊤⁢𝑺B‖2absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖0𝐵1subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑖topsubscript𝑿𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖topsubscript𝑺𝑖2subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝐵topsubscript𝑿𝐵superscriptsubscript𝑺𝐵topsubscript𝑺𝐵2\displaystyle=\sum_{i=0}^{B-1}\left\|\bm{X}_{i}^{\top}\bm{X}_{i}-\bm{S}_{i}^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}\right\|_{2}+\left\|\bm{X}_{B}^{\top}\bm{X}_{B}-\bm{S}_{B}^{% \top}\bm{S}_{B}\right\|_{2}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤∑i=0B−1ϵ2i+0absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖0𝐵1italic-ϵsuperscript2𝑖0\displaystyle\leq\sum_{i=0}^{B-1}\frac{\epsilon}{2^{i}}+0≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_ϵ end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG + 0
≤2⁢ϵ.absent2italic-ϵ\displaystyle\leq 2\epsilon.≤ 2 italic_ϵ .

For space usage, the i𝑖iitalic_i-th block employs a streaming matrix sketch with an error parameter of 12i⁢l01superscript2𝑖subscript𝑙0\frac{1}{2^{i}l_{0}}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, resulting in a sketch of size ℓ12i⁢l0subscriptℓ1superscript2𝑖subscript𝑙0\ell_{\frac{1}{2^{i}l_{0}}}roman_ℓ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, the total number of sketched rows is ∑i=0Bℓ12i⁢l0superscriptsubscript𝑖0𝐵subscriptℓ1superscript2𝑖subscript𝑙0\sum_{i=0}^{B}\ell_{\frac{1}{2^{i}l_{0}}}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Consequently, the total space requirement is O⁢(d⋅∑i=0Bℓ12i⁢l0)𝑂⋅𝑑superscriptsubscript𝑖0𝐵subscriptℓ1superscript2𝑖subscript𝑙0O\left(d\cdot\sum_{i=0}^{B}\ell_{\frac{1}{2^{i}l_{0}}}\right)italic_O ( italic_d ⋅ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ℓ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

For the update cost, since only the active sketch requires updating, the cost is O⁢(μ12B⁢l0)𝑂subscript𝜇1superscript2𝐵subscript𝑙0O\left(\mu_{\frac{1}{2^{B}l_{0}}}\right)italic_O ( italic_μ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

Appendix C Fast Algorithm of Dyadic Block Sketching

The computational cost of FD and RFD, as detailed in Algorithm 4 and 5, is primarily driven by the singular value decomposition (SVD) operations. At round t𝑡titalic_t, with Bt+1subscript𝐵𝑡1B_{t}+1italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 blocks, we denote lisubscript𝑙𝑖l_{i}italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the sketch size for the i𝑖iitalic_i-th block. It incurs an amortized time of O⁢(d⁢lBt2)𝑂𝑑superscriptsubscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2O\left(dl_{B_{t}}^{2}\right)italic_O ( italic_d italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) due to standard SVD processes in the active block. Additionally, the operation to compute 𝑴(t)superscript𝑴𝑡\bm{M}^{(t)}bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT via matrix multiplication and matrix inversion also requires O⁢(∑i=0Bt−1li⋅lBt⋅d+(∑i=0Btli)3)=O⁢(d⁢lBt2)𝑂superscriptsubscript𝑖0subscript𝐵𝑡1⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝑑superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖0subscript𝐵𝑡subscript𝑙𝑖3𝑂𝑑superscriptsubscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2O\left(\sum_{i=0}^{B_{t}-1}l_{i}\cdot l_{B_{t}}\cdot d+\left(\sum_{i=0}^{B_{t}% }l_{i}\right)^{3}\right)=O\left(dl_{B_{t}}^{2}\right)italic_O ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ italic_d + ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = italic_O ( italic_d italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ). We can enhance the efficiency of our Dyadic Block Sketching by doubling the sketch size, as detailed in Algorithm 3.

Notice that within each epoch, the update of 𝑴(t)superscript𝑴𝑡\bm{M}^{(t)}bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT can be formulate as

𝑴(t)=(𝑴(t−1)+ϕ⁢ϕ⊤ξ−ϕξ−ϕ⊤ξ1ξ),superscript𝑴𝑡matrixsuperscript𝑴𝑡1bold-italic-ϕsuperscriptbold-italic-ϕtop𝜉bold-italic-ϕ𝜉superscriptbold-italic-ϕtop𝜉1𝜉\bm{M}^{(t)}=\begin{pmatrix}\bm{M}^{(t-1)}+\frac{\bm{\phi}\bm{\phi}^{\top}}{% \xi}&\frac{-\bm{\phi}}{\xi}\\ \frac{-\bm{\phi}^{\top}}{\xi}&\frac{1}{\xi}\end{pmatrix},bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( start_ARG start_ROW start_CELL bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG bold_italic_ϕ bold_italic_ϕ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_ξ end_ARG end_CELL start_CELL divide start_ARG - bold_italic_ϕ end_ARG start_ARG italic_ξ end_ARG end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG - bold_italic_ϕ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_ξ end_ARG end_CELL start_CELL divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ξ end_ARG end_CELL end_ROW end_ARG ) , (10)

where ϕ=𝑴(t−1)⁢𝑺(t−1)⁢𝒙t⊤bold-italic-ϕsuperscript𝑴𝑡1superscript𝑺𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡top\bm{\phi}=\bm{M}^{(t-1)}\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}bold_italic_ϕ = bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and ξ=𝒙t⁢𝒙t⊤−𝒙t⁢(𝑺(t−1))⊤⁢ϕ+α+λ𝜉subscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡topsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡1topbold-italic-ϕ𝛼𝜆\xi=\bm{x}_{t}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}-\bm{x}_{t}\left(\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top}% \bm{\phi}+\alpha+\lambdaitalic_ξ = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_ϕ + italic_α + italic_λ.

When the method Sk=FDSkFD\text{Sk}=\text{FD}Sk = FD, α𝛼\alphaitalic_α is set to 0; conversely, when the method Sk=RFDSkRFD\text{Sk}=\text{RFD}Sk = RFD, α𝛼\alphaitalic_α serves as the counter maintained in the RFD sketch.

Given that the length of 𝑴(t)superscript𝑴𝑡\bm{M}^{(t)}bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is at most twice the length of 𝓑⁢[B].l⁢e⁢n⁢g⁢t⁢hformulae-sequence𝓑delimited-[]𝐵𝑙𝑒𝑛𝑔𝑡ℎ\bm{\mathcal{B}}[B].{length}bold_caligraphic_B [ italic_B ] . italic_l italic_e italic_n italic_g italic_t italic_h, the amortized computation time required for 𝑴(t)superscript𝑴𝑡\bm{M}^{(t)}bold_italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is limited to O⁢(d⁢lBt)𝑂𝑑subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡O\left(dl_{B_{t}}\right)italic_O ( italic_d italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Additionally, we perform the SVD only after every addition of 𝓑⁢[B].l⁢e⁢n⁢g⁢t⁢hformulae-sequence𝓑delimited-[]𝐵𝑙𝑒𝑛𝑔𝑡ℎ\bm{\mathcal{B}}[B].{length}bold_caligraphic_B [ italic_B ] . italic_l italic_e italic_n italic_g italic_t italic_h rows, reducing the amortized update time complexity to O⁢(d⁢lBt)𝑂𝑑subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡O\left(dl_{B_{t}}\right)italic_O ( italic_d italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

Appendix D Pseudo-code of Deterministic Matrix Sketching

The pseudo-code for deterministic matrix sketching methods is displayed in Algorithm 4 and Algorithm 5. Note that these deterministic matrix sketching methods can be accelerated by doubling the sketch size. More details can be found in Appendix C.

Appendix E Proof of Theorem 3

Following Abbasi-Yadkori et al. (2011), we structure the proof in two parts: first, we establish bounds for the approximate confidence ellipsoid, and second, we delineate the bounds for regret. Denote Btsubscript𝐵𝑡B_{t}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the number of blocks at round t𝑡titalic_t, and σ¯isubscript¯𝜎𝑖\overline{\sigma}_{i}over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the sum of shrinking singular values in the sketch of block i𝑖iitalic_i. Let lBtsubscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡l_{B_{t}}italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the sketch size in the active block at round t𝑡titalic_t. We start by establishing an intermediate result concerning the confidence ellipsoid.

Theorem 5.

Let 𝛉^tsubscript^𝛉𝑡\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the RLS estimate constructed by an arbitrary policy for linear bandits after t𝑡titalic_t rounds of play. For any δ∈(0,1)𝛿01\delta\in(0,1)italic_δ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ), the optimal unknown weight 𝛉⋆subscript𝛉⋆\bm{\theta}_{\star}bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT belongs to the set Θt≡{𝛉∈ℝd:‖𝛉−𝛉^t‖𝐀^(t)≤β^t⁢(δ)}subscriptΘ𝑡conditional-set𝛉superscriptℝ𝑑subscriptnorm𝛉subscript^𝛉𝑡superscript^𝐀𝑡subscript^𝛽𝑡𝛿\Theta_{t}\equiv\left\{\bm{\theta}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}:\left\|\bm{\theta}-\hat{% \bm{\theta}}_{t}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\leq\hat{\beta}_{t}(\delta)\right\}roman_Θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≡ { bold_italic_θ ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : ∥ bold_italic_θ - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) } with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, where

β^t⁢(δ)subscript^𝛽𝑡𝛿\displaystyle\hat{\beta}_{t}(\delta)over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) =R⋅1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ⋅2⁢ln⁡(1δ)+d⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ)absent⋅𝑅1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆21𝛿𝑑1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆\displaystyle=R\cdot\sqrt{1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{% \lambda}}\cdot\sqrt{2\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)+d\ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{% i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{t}}\cdot\ln\left(1+% \frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}\right)}= italic_R ⋅ square-root start_ARG 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG ) + italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG ) end_ARG
+H⋅λ+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ.⋅𝐻𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}+H\cdot\frac{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}}{\sqrt{\lambda}}.+ italic_H ⋅ divide start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG .
Proof.

According to Algorithm 2, the approximate covariance matrix is

𝑨^(t)=λ⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t),superscript^𝑨𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}=\lambda\bm{I}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}% \right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)},over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_λ bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where 𝑺i(t)superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the sketch matrix in block i𝑖iitalic_i at round t𝑡titalic_t. Define 𝒛1⊤,…,𝒛t⊤∈ℝdsuperscriptsubscript𝒛1top…superscriptsubscript𝒛𝑡topsuperscriptℝ𝑑\bm{z}_{1}^{\top},...,\bm{z}_{t}^{\top}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the noise sequence conditionally R-subgaussian for a fixed constant R𝑅Ritalic_R and 𝒓t⊤=(r1,r2,…⁢rt)∈ℝdsuperscriptsubscript𝒓𝑡topsubscript𝑟1subscript𝑟2…subscript𝑟𝑡superscriptℝ𝑑\bm{r}_{t}^{\top}=(r_{1},r_{2},...r_{t})\in\mathbb{R}^{d}bold_italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the reward vector. We begin by noticing that

𝜽^t=(𝑨^(t))−1⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒓t=(𝑨^(t))−1⁢𝑿t⊤⁢(𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆+𝒛t).subscript^𝜽𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒓𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆subscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}=\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}\bm{X}_% {t}^{\top}\bm{r}_{t}=\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}% \left(\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}+\bm{z}_{t}\right).over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Therefore, we can decompose ‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^% {2}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT into two parts as follows

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (11)
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑨^(t)⁢(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscript^𝑨𝑡subscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )

Bounding the bias error.

We first focus on bounding the first term. We have that

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑨^(t)⁢((𝑨^(t))−1⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆−𝜽⋆)superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\left(\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}\bm{% X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (12)
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆−𝑨^(t)⁢𝜽⋆)absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{% -\frac{1}{2}}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}-\hat{\bm{A}}% ^{(t)}\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢[(𝑨(t)−𝑨^(t))⁢𝜽⋆−λ⁢𝜽⋆].absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12delimited-[]superscript𝑨𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡subscript𝜽⋆𝜆subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{% -\frac{1}{2}}\left[\left(\bm{A}^{(t)}-\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)\bm{\theta}_{% \star}-\lambda\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right].= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_λ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] .

In accordance with the decomposability of matrix sketches, as detailed in Lemma 1, we have

‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)‖2≤∑i=1Btσ¯isubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡2superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}% \right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right\|_{2}\leq\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (13)

By Cauchy-Schwartz inequality and the triangle inequality, we have

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢[(𝑨(t)−𝑨^(t))⁢𝜽⋆−λ⁢𝜽⋆]superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12delimited-[]superscript𝑨𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡subscript𝜽⋆𝜆subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^% {(t)}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}}\left[\left(\bm{A}^{(t)}-\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)% \bm{\theta}_{\star}-\lambda\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right]( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_λ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] (14)
≤|λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i|⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝜽⋆‖(𝑨^(t))−1absent⋅𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript𝜽⋆superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\leq\left|\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\right|% \cdot\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(% t)}}\cdot\left\|\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{% -1}}≤ | italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤H⋅λ+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t),absent⋅𝐻𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\leq H\cdot\frac{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}% {\sqrt{\lambda}}\cdot\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_% {\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}},≤ italic_H ⋅ divide start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

Bounding the variance error.

Then, we aim to bound the second term. We use the following self-normalized martingale concentration inequality by Abbasi-Yadkori et al. (2011).

Proposition 1.

Assume that 𝐳1,…,𝐳tsubscript𝐳1…subscript𝐳𝑡\bm{z}_{1},...,\bm{z}_{t}bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is a conditionally R-subgaussian real-valued stochastic process and 𝐗t⊤=[𝐱1⊤,…,𝐱t⊤]superscriptsubscript𝐗𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝐱1top…superscriptsubscript𝐱𝑡top\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}=\left[\bm{x}_{1}^{\top},...,\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}\right]bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = [ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] is any stochastic process such that 𝐱isubscript𝐱𝑖\bm{x}_{i}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is measurable with respect to the σ𝜎\sigmaitalic_σ-algebra generated by 𝐳1,…,𝐳tsubscript𝐳1…subscript𝐳𝑡\bm{z}_{1},...,\bm{z}_{t}bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , … , bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Then, for any δ>0𝛿0\delta>0italic_δ > 0, with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, for all t≥0𝑡0t\geq 0italic_t ≥ 0,

‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−12≤2⁢R2⁢ln⁡(1δ⁢|𝑨(t)|12⁢|λ⁢𝑰|−12).superscriptsubscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡122superscript𝑅21𝛿superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscript𝜆𝑰12\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}\right\|_{\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}^% {2}\leq 2R^{2}\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|^{\frac{1}{2}}% \left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|^{-\frac{1}{2}}\right).∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ 2 italic_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG | bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_λ bold_italic_I | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Notice that the variance error can be reformulated as

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛tsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}\bm{% X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨(t))−12⁢(𝑨(t))12⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛tabsentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}}\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1% }{2}}\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (15)
≤‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−1,absent⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\leq\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}\cdot\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}\right\|_% {\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}},≤ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where the last inequality uses Cauchy-Schwartz inequality.

For any vector 𝒂𝒂\bm{a}bold_italic_a, we have

‖𝒂‖𝑨(t)2−‖𝒂‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂superscript𝑨𝑡2superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle\|\bm{a}\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}-\|\bm{a}\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =𝒂⊤⁢(𝑨(t)−𝑨^(t))⁢𝒂absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscript𝑨𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡𝒂\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}-\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a (16)
=𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿⊤⁢𝑿−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝒂absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscript𝑿top𝑿superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡𝒂\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}^{\top}\bm{X}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a
≤∑i=1Btσ¯i⋅‖𝒂‖22.absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂22\displaystyle\leq\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\cdot\|\bm{a}\|_{2}^{2}.≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Therefore, the ratios of norms on the right-hand side of equation 15 can be bounded as

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{{% \bm{A}}^{(t)}}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat% {\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG =‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)2‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2absentsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle=\sqrt{\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star% }\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}}}= square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG (17)
≤‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2+∑i=1Btσ¯i⁢‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖2‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2absentsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{{\hat{\bm{A}}}^{(t)}}^{2}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}% \left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|^{2}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{% \theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}}}≤ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG
≤1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ.absent1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{% \lambda}}.≤ square-root start_ARG 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG .

Substituting equation 17 and Proposition 1 into equation 15 gives

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−1⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{% \theta}_{\star}\right\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{% \theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}\cdot\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{% z}_{t}\right\|_{\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (18)
≤1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ⋅2⁢R2⁢ln⁡(1δ⁢|𝑨(t)|12⁢|λ⁢𝑰|−12)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t).absent⋅1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆2superscript𝑅21𝛿superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscript𝜆𝑰12subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{% \lambda}}\cdot\sqrt{2R^{2}\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|^{% \frac{1}{2}}\left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|^{-\frac{1}{2}}\right)}\cdot\left\|\hat{% \bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}.≤ square-root start_ARG 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 italic_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG | bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_λ bold_italic_I | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Motivated by Abbasi-Yadkori et al. (2011); Kuzborskij et al. (2019), we apply the multi-scale sketch-based determinant-trace inequality. Compared to the non-sketched version, this inequality depends on the approximate covariance matrix 𝑨^^𝑨\hat{\bm{A}}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG, reflecting the costs associated with the shrinkage due to multi-scale sketching.

Lemma 2.

For any t≥1𝑡1t\geq 1italic_t ≥ 1, define 𝐀(t)=λ⁢𝐈+𝐗t⊤⁢𝐗tsuperscript𝐀𝑡𝜆𝐈superscriptsubscript𝐗𝑡topsubscript𝐗𝑡\bm{A}^{(t)}=\lambda\bm{I}+\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_λ bold_italic_I + bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and assume ‖𝐱t‖2≤Lsubscriptnormsubscript𝐱𝑡2𝐿\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{2}\leq L∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_L, we have

ln⁡(|𝑨(t)||λ⁢𝑰|)≤d⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ).superscript𝑨𝑡𝜆𝑰𝑑1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆\ln\left(\frac{\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|}{\left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|}\right)% \leq d\ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right% )+2l_{B_{t}}\cdot\ln\left(1+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}\right).roman_ln ( divide start_ARG | bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG | italic_λ bold_italic_I | end_ARG ) ≤ italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG ) .
Proof.

∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT has rank at most 2⁢lBt2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2l_{B_{t}}2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT due to the Dyadic Block Sketching. Since 𝑨^(t)=λ⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)superscript^𝑨𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}=\lambda\bm{I}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}% \right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_λ bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and 𝑨(t)⪯𝑨^(t)+∑i=1Btσ¯i⋅𝑰precedes-or-equalssuperscript𝑨𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑰\bm{A}^{(t)}\preceq\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}% \cdot\bm{I}bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⪯ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ bold_italic_I, we have

|𝑨(t)|superscript𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|| bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ≤|𝑨^(t)+∑i=1Btσ¯i⋅𝑰|absentsuperscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑰\displaystyle\leq\left|\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_% {i}\cdot\bm{I}\right|≤ | over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ bold_italic_I |
≤(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i)d−2⁢lBt⋅(∑i=12⁢lBt(λi⁢(𝑨^(t))+∑i=1Btσ¯i)2⁢lBt)2⁢lBtabsent⋅superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖12subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡subscript𝜆𝑖superscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡\displaystyle\leq\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\right)^% {d-2l_{B_{t}}}\cdot\left(\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{2l_{B_{t}}}\left(\lambda_{i}\left(% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\right)}{2l_{% B_{t}}}\right)^{2l_{B_{t}}}≤ ( italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i)d−2⁢lBt⋅(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i+Tr⁢(∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))2⁢lBt)2⁢lBtabsent⋅superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖Trsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡\displaystyle\leq\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\right)^% {d-2l_{B_{t}}}\cdot\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}+\frac% {\text{Tr}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{% i}^{(t)}\right)}{2l_{B_{t}}}\right)^{2l_{B_{t}}}≤ ( italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - ≤(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i)d−2⁢lBt⋅(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i+t⁢L22⁢lBt)2⁢lBt,absent⋅superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡\displaystyle\leq\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}\right)^% {d-2l_{B_{t}}}\cdot\left(\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}+\frac% {tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}}\right)^{2l_{B_{t}}},≤ ( italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ ( italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where the last inequality holds because

Tr⁢(∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))Trsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\text{Tr}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}% ^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)Tr ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
≤Tr⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t)absentTrsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡\displaystyle\leq\text{Tr}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\right)≤ Tr ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
=∑s=1t𝒙s⊤⁢𝒙sabsentsuperscriptsubscript𝑠1𝑡superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑠topsubscript𝒙𝑠\displaystyle=\sum_{s=1}^{t}{\bm{x}_{s}^{\top}\bm{x}_{s}}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤t⁢L2absent𝑡superscript𝐿2\displaystyle\leq tL^{2}≤ italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Therefore, we have

ln⁡(|𝑨(t)||λ⁢𝑰|)superscript𝑨𝑡𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\ln\left(\frac{\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|}{\left|\lambda\bm{I}% \right|}\right)roman_ln ( divide start_ARG | bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG | italic_λ bold_italic_I | end_ARG ) ≤ln⁡{(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)d−2⁢lBt⋅(λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i+t⁢L22⁢lBtλ)2⁢lBt}absent⋅superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡\displaystyle\leq\ln\left\{\left(\frac{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)^{d-2l_{B_{t}}}\cdot\left(\frac{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}% ^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}}}{\lambda}\right)^{2l_{% B_{t}}}\right\}≤ roman_ln { ( divide start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ ( divide start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT }
=(d−2⁢lBt)⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ)absent𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆\displaystyle=(d-2l_{B_{t}})\ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{t}}\ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}% \overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}\right)= ( italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG )
≤d⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ).absent𝑑1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆\displaystyle\leq d\ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{% \lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{t}}\cdot\ln\left(1+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}% \right).≤ italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG ) .

∎

According to Lemma 2, we finally bound the variance error term as follows

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−1⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{% \theta}_{\star}\right\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{% \theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}\cdot\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{% z}_{t}\right\|_{\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ⋅2⁢R2⁢ln⁡(1δ⁢|𝑨(t)|12⁢|λ⁢𝑰|−12)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)absent⋅1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆2superscript𝑅21𝛿superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscript𝜆𝑰12subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\leq\sqrt{1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{% \lambda}}\cdot\sqrt{2R^{2}\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\left|\bm{A}^{(t)}\right|^{% \frac{1}{2}}\left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|^{-\frac{1}{2}}\right)}\cdot\left\|\hat{% \bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}≤ square-root start_ARG 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 italic_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG | bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_λ bold_italic_I | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

Sum up the bias error and the variance error and divide both sides of equation 11 by ‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT simultaneously, we have

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{% \bm{A}}^{(t)}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT -
