+H⋅λ+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ,⋅𝐻𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}+H\cdot\frac{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}}{\sqrt{\lambda}},+ italic_H ⋅ divide start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ,

which concludes the proof. ∎ Having established the confidence ellipsoid, we now focus on analyzing the regret. We begin with an analysis of the instantaneous regret.

Recall that the optimal arm at round t𝑡titalic_t is defined as 𝒙t⋆=arg⁡max𝒙∈𝒳t⁢(𝒙⊤⁢𝜽⋆)superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡⋆𝒙subscript𝒳𝑡superscript𝒙topsubscript𝜽⋆\bm{x}_{t}^{\star}=\underset{\bm{x}\in\mathcal{X}_{t}}{\arg\max}(\bm{x}^{\top}% \bm{\theta}_{\star})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = start_UNDERACCENT bold_italic_x ∈ caligraphic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_UNDERACCENT start_ARG roman_arg roman_max end_ARG ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). On the other hand, the principle of optimism in the face of uncertainty ensures that (𝒙t,𝜽^t−1)=arg⁡max(𝒙,𝜽)∈𝒳t×Θt−1⁢𝒙⊤⁢𝜽subscript𝒙𝑡subscript^𝜽𝑡1𝒙𝜽subscript𝒳𝑡subscriptΘ𝑡1superscript𝒙top𝜽\left(\bm{x}_{t},\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t-1}\right)=\underset{(\bm{x},\bm{\theta})% \in\mathcal{X}_{t}\times\Theta_{t-1}}{\arg\max}\bm{x}^{\top}\bm{\theta}( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = start_UNDERACCENT ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_θ ) ∈ caligraphic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT × roman_Θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_UNDERACCENT start_ARG roman_arg roman_max end_ARG bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ. By denoting 𝜽~tsubscript~𝜽𝑡\tilde{\bm{\theta}}_{t}over~ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the RLS estimator, we utilize these facts to establish the bound on the instantaneous regret as follows

Now, we are prepared to establish the upper bound of regret. Utilizing equation 19 and Cauchy-Schwartz inequality, we derive the following bound

Besides, we adopt the Sketched leverage scores established by Kuzborskij et al. (2019) as follows

According to Theorem 2, we can bound the spectral error by error ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ, which is

RegretTsubscriptRegret𝑇\displaystyle\text{Regret}_{T}Regret start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =O~⁢L⁢(R+H⁢λ)λ⋅(d⁢ln⁡(1+ϵλ)+2⁢lBT⋅ln⁡(1+T⁢L22⁢lBT⁢λ))⋅(1+ϵλ)32⁢T.⋅~𝑂𝐿𝑅𝐻𝜆𝜆𝑑1italic-ϵ𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇1𝑇superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇𝜆superscript1italic-ϵ𝜆32𝑇\displaystyle\overset{\tilde{O}}{=}\frac{L(R+H\sqrt{\lambda})}{\sqrt{\lambda}}% \cdot\left(d\ln\left(1+\frac{\epsilon}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{T}}\cdot\ln\left% (1+\frac{TL^{2}}{2l_{B_{T}}\lambda}\right)\right)\cdot\left({1+\frac{\epsilon}% {\lambda}}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}\sqrt{T}.start_OVERACCENT over~ start_ARG italic_O end_ARG end_OVERACCENT start_ARG = end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_L ( italic_R + italic_H square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG ⋅ ( italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_ϵ end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_T italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG ) ) ⋅ ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_ϵ end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_T end_ARG .

Appendix F Proof of Theorem 4

We denote Btsubscript𝐵𝑡B_{t}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the number of blocks at round t𝑡titalic_t, and σ¯isubscript¯𝜎𝑖\overline{\sigma}_{i}over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the cumulative shrinking singular values in the sketch of block i𝑖iitalic_i. Let lBtsubscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡l_{B_{t}}italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the sketch size in the active block at round t𝑡titalic_t. Similarly, our analysis establishes an intermediate result regarding the confidence ellipsoid.

Theorem 6.

Let 𝛉^tsubscript^𝛉𝑡\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be the RLS estimate constructed by an arbitrary policy for linear bandits after t𝑡titalic_t rounds of play. For any δ∈(0,1)𝛿01\delta\in(0,1)italic_δ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ), the optimal unknown weight 𝛉⋆subscript𝛉⋆\bm{\theta}_{\star}bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT belongs to the set Θt≡{𝛉∈ℝd:‖𝛉−𝛉^t‖𝐀^(t)≤β^t⁢(δ)}subscriptΘ𝑡conditional-set𝛉superscriptℝ𝑑subscriptnorm𝛉subscript^𝛉𝑡superscript^𝐀𝑡subscript^𝛽𝑡𝛿\Theta_{t}\equiv\left\{\bm{\theta}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}:\left\|\bm{\theta}-\hat{% \bm{\theta}}_{t}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\leq\hat{\beta}_{t}(\delta)\right\}roman_Θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≡ { bold_italic_θ ∈ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : ∥ bold_italic_θ - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) } with probability at least 1−δ1𝛿1-\delta1 - italic_δ, where

+H⋅λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i⋅𝐻𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}+H\cdot\sqrt{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}}+ italic_H ⋅ square-root start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG

and

Proof.

Notice that RFD uses the adaptive regularization term to approximate the covariance matrix, i.e., 𝑨^(t)=λ⁢𝑰+∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)superscript^𝑨𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}=\lambda\bm{I}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}+\sum% _{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_λ bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where 𝑺i(t)superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the sketch matrix in block i𝑖iitalic_i and αi(t)superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡\alpha_{i}^{(t)}italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the adaptive regularization term of RFD at round t𝑡titalic_t.

Similarily, we decompose ‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^% {2}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT into two parts as follows

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑨^(t)⁢(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscript^𝑨𝑡subscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )

=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑨^(t)⁢((𝑨^(t))−1⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆−𝜽⋆)⏟Term 1: Bias Error+(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t⏟Term 2: Variance Error.absentsubscript⏟superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆subscript𝜽⋆Term 1: Bias Errorsubscript⏟superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡Term 2: Variance Error\displaystyle=\underbrace{\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\left(\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}\bm{% X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)}_{\text{% Term 1: Bias Error}}+\underbrace{\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{% \star}\right)^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}}_{\text{Term 2: Variance Error% }}.= under⏟ start_ARG ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - Bounding the bias error.

For the bias error term, we have

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑨^(t)⁢((𝑨^(t))−1⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆−𝜽⋆)superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscript^𝑨𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\left(\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}\bm{% X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) (22)
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t⁢𝜽⋆−𝑨^(t)⁢𝜽⋆)absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{% -\frac{1}{2}}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\bm{\theta}_{\star}-\hat{\bm{A}}% ^{(t)}\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
=(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−λ⁢𝑰−∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝜽⋆absentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{% -\frac{1}{2}}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\lambda\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}% }\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{\theta}_{\star}= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≜(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢𝑫t⋅𝜽⋆≜absent⋅superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12subscript𝑫𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle\triangleq\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^% {\top}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}% \right)^{-\frac{1}{2}}\bm{D}_{t}\cdot\bm{\theta}_{\star}≜ ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

Since 𝑫t=𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−λ⁢𝑰−∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)subscript𝑫𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\bm{D}_{t}=\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\lambda\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_% {i}^{(t)}\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{% i}^{(t)}bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_λ bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, for any unit vector 𝒂𝒂\bm{a}bold_italic_a, we have

|𝒂⊤⁢𝑫t⁢𝒂|superscript𝒂topsubscript𝑫𝑡𝒂\displaystyle\left|\bm{a}^{\top}\bm{D}_{t}\bm{a}\right|| bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_a | =|𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−λ⁢𝑰−∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝒂|absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡𝒂\displaystyle=\left|\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\lambda\bm{% I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}% ^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}\right|= | bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_λ bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a | (23)
=|𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝒂−λ⁢𝑰−∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰|.absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡𝒂𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰\displaystyle=\left|\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\sum_{i=1}^% {B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}-% \lambda\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}\right|.= | bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a - italic_λ bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I | .

According to Theroem 2, we can get

0≤𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝒂≤∑i=1Btσ¯i.0superscript𝒂topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡𝒂superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖0\leq\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}\leq\sum_{i=1}^{B_{% t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}.0 ≤ bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a ≤ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Bring the above equation into equation 23, since ∑i=1Btαi(t)=∑i=1Btσ¯isuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we can bound the spectral norm of 𝑫tsubscript𝑫𝑡\bm{D}_{t}bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as follows

‖𝑫t‖2≤λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i.subscriptnormsubscript𝑫𝑡2𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle\|\bm{D}_{t}\|_{2}\leq\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}% _{i}.∥ bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . (24)

By Cauchy-Schwartz inequality and the triangle inequality, we can bound equation 22 by

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨^(t))12⁢(𝑨^(t))−12⁢𝑫t⋅𝜽⋆⋅superscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12subscript𝑫𝑡subscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^% {(t)}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}}\bm{D}_{t}\cdot\bm{\theta}_{\star}( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (25)
≤‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑫t‖2⋅‖𝜽⋆‖(𝑨^(t))−1absent⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript𝑫𝑡2subscriptnormsubscript𝜽⋆superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\leq\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\|\bm{D}_{t}\|_{2}\cdot\left\|\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}≤ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

‖𝜽⋆‖(𝑨^(t))−12≤‖𝜽⋆‖22λmin⁢(𝑨^(t))≤H2λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i.superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜽⋆superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝜽⋆22subscript𝜆minsuperscript^𝑨𝑡superscript𝐻2𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\left\|\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}% \leq\frac{\|\bm{\theta}_{\star}\|_{2}^{2}}{\lambda_{\text{min}}\left(\hat{\bm{% A}}^{(t)}\right)}\leq\frac{H^{2}}{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_% {i}}.∥ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG ∥ bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ≤ divide start_ARG italic_H start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Bounding the variance error.

For the variance error, we have

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛tsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}\bm{% X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢(𝑨(t))−12⁢(𝑨(t))12⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛tabsentsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡12superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle=\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right)^{\top}% \left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}}\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{\frac{1% }{2}}\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}= ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (26)
≤‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨(t)‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−1absent⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\leq\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\frac{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}{\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}}\cdot\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}\right\|_% {\left({\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}≤ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ divide start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)⋅‖𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛t‖(𝑨(t))−1.absent⋅subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡superscriptsuperscript𝑨𝑡1\displaystyle\leq\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}\cdot\left\|\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}\right\|_{\left({\bm% {A}}^{(t)}\right)^{-1}}.≤ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

where the last inequality holds because for any vector 𝒂𝒂\bm{a}bold_italic_a

‖𝒂‖𝑨(t)2−‖𝒂‖𝑨^(t)2superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂superscript𝑨𝑡2superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂superscript^𝑨𝑡2\displaystyle\|\bm{a}\|_{{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}-\|\bm{a}\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}^{2}∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_A start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿⊤⁢𝑿−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)−∑i=1Btσ¯i⁢𝑰)⁢𝒂absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscript𝑿top𝑿superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝑰𝒂\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}^{\top}\bm{X}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}\bm{I}\right)\bm{a}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_I ) bold_italic_a (27)
=𝒂⊤⁢(𝑿⊤⁢𝑿−∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))⁢𝒂−∑i=1Btσ¯i⁢‖𝒂‖22absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscript𝑿top𝑿superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡𝒂superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptsubscriptnorm𝒂22\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\bm{X}^{\top}\bm{X}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)\bm{a}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}% \overline{\sigma}_{i}\|\bm{a}\|_{2}^{2}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ bold_italic_a ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

By Proposition 1, we can bound the variance error term as follows

where the last inequality satisfies due to

Tr⁢(∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))Trsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\displaystyle\text{Tr}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)Tr ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) =∑i=1BtTr⁢((𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t))absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡Trsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\displaystyle=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\text{Tr}\left(\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT Tr ( ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=∑s=1tTr⁢(𝒙s⊤⁢𝒙s)−∑i=1Btli⋅σ¯iabsentsuperscriptsubscript𝑠1𝑡Trsuperscriptsubscript𝒙𝑠topsubscript𝒙𝑠superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle=\sum_{s=1}^{t}\text{Tr}(\bm{x}_{s}^{\top}\bm{x}_{s})-\sum_{i=1}^% {B_{t}}l_{i}\cdot\overline{\sigma}_{i}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT Tr ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤T⁢L2−∑i=1Btli⋅σ¯i.absent𝑇superscript𝐿2superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle\leq TL^{2}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}l_{i}\cdot\overline{\sigma}_{i}.≤ italic_T italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Therefore, the variance error term can be bounded as

(𝜽^t−𝜽⋆)⊤⁢𝑿t⊤⁢𝒛tsuperscriptsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆topsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝒛𝑡\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\left(\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}% \right)^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{z}_{t}( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_z start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

≤R⋅2⁢ln⁡(1δ)+(d−2⁢lBt)⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ+htλ)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)absent⋅𝑅21𝛿𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆subscriptℎ𝑡𝜆subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\leq R\cdot\sqrt{2\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)+(d-2l_{B_{t}})% \ln\left(1+\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{% B_{t}}\cdot\ln\left(1+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}+\frac{h_{t}}{\lambda}% \right)}\cdot\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{% \bm{A}}^{(t)}}≤ italic_R ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG ) + ( italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) end_ARG ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤R⋅2⁢ln⁡(1δ)+d⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ+htλ)⋅‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t),absent⋅𝑅21𝛿𝑑1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆subscriptℎ𝑡𝜆subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\leq R\cdot\sqrt{2\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)+d\ln\left(1+% \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{t}}\cdot% \ln\left(1+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}+\frac{h_{t}}{\lambda}\right)}\cdot% \left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}},≤ italic_R ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG ) + italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) end_ARG ⋅ ∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where ht=∑i=1Btσ¯i−∑i=1Btli⋅σ¯i2⁢lBtsubscriptℎ𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript¯𝜎𝑖2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡h_{t}=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}-\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}l_{i}% \cdot\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{2l_{B_{t}}}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG.

Sum up the bias error term and the variance error term and divide both sides by ‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT simultaneously, we have

‖𝜽^t−𝜽⋆‖𝑨^(t)subscriptnormsubscript^𝜽𝑡subscript𝜽⋆superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\left\|\hat{\bm{\theta}}_{t}-\bm{\theta}_{\star}\right\|_{\hat{% \bm{A}}^{(t)}}∥ over^ start_ARG bold_italic_θ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤R⋅2⁢ln⁡(1δ)+d⁢ln⁡(1+∑i=1Btσ¯iλ)+2⁢lBt⋅ln⁡(1+t⁢L22⁢lBt⁢λ+htλ)absent⋅𝑅21𝛿𝑑1superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡1𝑡superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆subscriptℎ𝑡𝜆\displaystyle\leq R\cdot\sqrt{2\ln\left(\frac{1}{\delta}\right)+d\ln\left(1+% \frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{\lambda}\right)+2l_{B_{t}}\cdot% \ln\left(1+\frac{tL^{2}}{2l_{B_{t}}\lambda}+\frac{h_{t}}{\lambda}\right)}≤ italic_R ⋅ square-root start_ARG 2 roman_ln ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG ) + italic_d roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) + 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_t italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) end_ARG
+H⋅λ+∑i=1Btσ¯i,⋅𝐻𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}+H\cdot\sqrt{\lambda+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}},+ italic_H ⋅ square-root start_ARG italic_λ + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ,

which concludes the proof. ∎ Next, we start to prove the regret. Similar to the case using FD, since the algorithm uses the principle of optimism in the face of uncertainty to select the arm, we can bound instantaneous regret by equation 19. Utilizing equation 19 and Cauchy-Schwartz inequality, we derive the following bound

RegretTsubscriptRegret𝑇\displaystyle\text{Regret}_{T}Regret start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑t=1Tmax𝒙∈𝒳⁡𝒙⊤⁢𝜽⋆−∑t=1T𝒙t⊤⁢𝜽⋆absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇subscript𝒙𝒳superscript𝒙topsubscript𝜽⋆superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡topsubscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\sum_{t=1}^{T}\max_{\bm{x}\in\mathcal{X}}\bm{x}^{\top}\bm{\theta% }_{\star}-\sum_{t=1}^{T}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}\bm{\theta}_{\star}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x ∈ caligraphic_X end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT (30)
≤2⁢∑t=1Tmin⁡{H⁢L,β^t−1⁢(δ)⋅‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−1}absent2superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇𝐻𝐿⋅subscript^𝛽𝑡1𝛿subscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡11\displaystyle\leq 2\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{HL,\hat{\beta}_{t-1}(\delta)\cdot% \|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}\right\}≤ 2 ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { italic_H italic_L , over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) ⋅ ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }

≤2⋅max⁡{1,Lλ}⋅β^T⁢(δ)⋅∑t=1Tmin⁡{1,‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−1}absent⋅⋅21𝐿𝜆subscript^𝛽𝑇𝛿superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1subscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡11\displaystyle\leq 2\cdot\max\left\{1,\frac{L}{\sqrt{\lambda}}\right\}\cdot\hat% {\beta}_{T}(\delta)\cdot\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{1,\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(\hat{% \bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}\right\}≤ 2 ⋅ roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG } ⋅ over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) ⋅ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { 1 , ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }
≤2⋅max⁡{1,Lλ}⋅β^T⁢(δ)⋅T⁢∑t=1Tmin⁡{1,‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12}.absent⋅⋅21𝐿𝜆subscript^𝛽𝑇𝛿𝑇superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112\displaystyle\leq 2\cdot\max\left\{1,\frac{L}{\sqrt{\lambda}}\right\}\cdot\hat% {\beta}_{T}(\delta)\cdot\sqrt{T\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{1,\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}\right\}}.≤ 2 ⋅ roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG } ⋅ over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) ⋅ square-root start_ARG italic_T ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { 1 , ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } end_ARG .

We present a lemma of RFD-sketched leverage scores to conclude the proof.

Lemma 3.
∑t=1Tmin⁡{1,‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12}≤2⁢lBT⋅ln⁡(1+T⁢L22⁢lBT⁢λ+hTλ).superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇1𝑇superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇𝜆subscriptℎ𝑇𝜆\displaystyle\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{1,\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t% -1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}\right\}\leq 2l_{B_{T}}\cdot\ln\left(1+\frac{TL^{2}}{2l_{% B_{T}}\lambda}+\frac{h_{T}}{\lambda}\right).∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { 1 , ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ≤ 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_T italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) .
Proof.

Denote 𝑪t=𝑨^(t−1)+𝒙t⊤⁢𝒙tsubscript𝑪𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡topsubscript𝒙𝑡\bm{C}_{t}=\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}+\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}\bm{x}_{t}bold_italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Notice that the first 2⁢lBt2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡{2l_{B_{t}}}2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT eigenvalues of 𝑪tsubscript𝑪𝑡\bm{C}_{t}bold_italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT are the same as 𝑨^(t)superscript^𝑨𝑡\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT while the other eigenvalues of 𝑪tsubscript𝑪𝑡\bm{C}_{t}bold_italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT are ∑i=1Btαi(t−1)+λsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝜆\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t-1)}+\lambda∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ. Thus we can obtain |𝑨^(t)||𝑪t|=(∑i=1Btαi(t)+λ∑i=1Bt−1αi(t−1)+λ)d−2⁢lBtsuperscript^𝑨𝑡subscript𝑪𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡\frac{\left|\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right|}{\left|\bm{C}_{t}\right|}=\left(\frac{% \sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}+\lambda}{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t-1}}\alpha_{i}^{(t% -1)}+\lambda}\right)^{d-{2l_{B_{t}}}}divide start_ARG | over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG | bold_italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | end_ARG = ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

For the determinant of 𝑨^(t)superscript^𝑨𝑡\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have

|𝑨^(t)|superscript^𝑨𝑡\displaystyle\left|\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t)}\right|| over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | =(∑i=1Btαi(t)+λ∑i=1Bt−1αi(t−1)+λ)d−2⁢lBt⋅|𝑪t|absent⋅superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡subscript𝑪𝑡\displaystyle=\left(\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}+\lambda}{\sum_{i=% 1}^{B_{t-1}}\alpha_{i}^{(t-1)}+\lambda}\right)^{d-{2l_{B_{t}}}}\cdot\left|\bm{% C}_{t}\right|= ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ | bold_italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | (31)
=(∑i=1Btαi(t)+λ∑i=1Bt−1αi(t−1)+λ)d−2⁢lBt⋅|𝑨^(t−1)|⋅|𝑰+(𝑨^(t−1))−1⁢𝒙t⊤⁢𝒙t|absent⋅superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡1𝑰superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡11superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡topsubscript𝒙𝑡\displaystyle=\left(\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}+\lambda}{\sum_{i=% 1}^{B_{t-1}}\alpha_{i}^{(t-1)}+\lambda}\right)^{d-{2l_{B_{t}}}}\cdot\left|\hat% {\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right|\cdot{\left|\bm{I}+\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-% 1}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}\bm{x}_{t}\right|}= ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ | over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ⋅ | bold_italic_I + ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT |
=(∑i=1Btαi(t)+λ∑i=1Bt−1αi(t−1)+λ)d−2⁢lBt⋅|𝑨^(t−1)|⋅(1+‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12)absent⋅superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡superscript^𝑨𝑡11superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112\displaystyle=\left(\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}+\lambda}{\sum_{i=% 1}^{B_{t-1}}\alpha_{i}^{(t-1)}+\lambda}\right)^{d-{2l_{B_{t}}}}\cdot\left|\hat% {\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right|\cdot{\left({1+\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1% )}\right)^{-1}}^{2}}\right)}= ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ | over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ⋅ ( 1 + ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=(∑i=1Btσ¯i+λλ)d−2⁢lBt⋅|λ⁢𝑰|⋅∏s=1t(1+‖𝒙s‖(𝑨^(s−1))−12).absent⋅superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑡𝜆𝑰superscriptsubscriptproduct𝑠1𝑡1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑠superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑠112\displaystyle=\left(\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}+\lambda}{% \lambda}\right)^{d-{2l_{B_{t}}}}\cdot\left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|\cdot\prod_{s=1% }^{t}{\left({1+\|\bm{x}_{s}\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(s-1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}}% \right)}.= ( divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ | italic_λ bold_italic_I | ⋅ ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Since min⁡(1,x)≤2⁢ln⁡(1+x)1𝑥21𝑥\min{(1,x)}\leq 2\ln{(1+x)}roman_min ( 1 , italic_x ) ≤ 2 roman_ln ( 1 + italic_x ) for all x≥0𝑥0x\geq 0italic_x ≥ 0, using equation 31, we can derive the following bound

∑t=1Tmin⁡{1,‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12}superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{1,\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(% \hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}\right\}∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { 1 , ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT }
≤2⁢∑t=1Tln⁡(1+‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12)absent2superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112\displaystyle\leq 2\sum_{t=1}^{T}\ln\left(1+\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{\left(\hat{\bm{A}}% ^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}\right)≤ 2 ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_ln ( 1 + ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=2⋅ln⁡((λ∑i=1BTσ¯i+λ)d−2⁢lBT⋅|𝑨^(T)||λ⁢𝑰|)absent⋅2⋅superscript𝜆superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇subscript¯𝜎𝑖𝜆𝑑2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇superscript^𝑨𝑇𝜆𝑰\displaystyle=2\cdot\ln\left(\left(\frac{\lambda}{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}\overline{% \sigma}_{i}+\lambda}\right)^{d-2l_{B_{T}}}\cdot\frac{\left|\hat{\bm{A}}^{(T)}% \right|}{\left|\lambda\bm{I}\right|}\right)= 2 ⋅ roman_ln ( ( divide start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_λ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d - 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⋅ divide start_ARG | over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_T ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG | italic_λ bold_italic_I | end_ARG )
≤2⁢lBT⋅ln⁡(1+T⁢L22⁢lBT⁢λ+hTλ),absent⋅2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇1𝑇superscript𝐿22subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇𝜆subscriptℎ𝑇𝜆\displaystyle\leq 2l_{B_{T}}\cdot\ln\left(1+\frac{TL^{2}}{2l_{B_{T}}\lambda}+% \frac{h_{T}}{\lambda}\right),≤ 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ roman_ln ( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_T italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_λ end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG ) ,

where the last step holds by equation 29 and hT=∑i=1BTσ¯i−∑i=1BTli⋅σ¯i2⁢lBTsubscriptℎ𝑇superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript¯𝜎𝑖2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇h_{T}=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}-\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}l_{i}% \cdot\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{2l_{B_{T}}}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG. ∎

We combine equation 30, Theorem 6 and Lemma 3. Assume L≥λ𝐿𝜆L\geq\sqrt{\lambda}italic_L ≥ square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG, we have

RegretTsubscriptRegret𝑇\displaystyle\text{Regret}_{T}Regret start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑t=1Tmax𝒙∈𝒳⁡𝒙⊤⁢𝜽⋆−∑t=1T𝒙t⊤⁢𝜽⋆absentsuperscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇subscript𝒙𝒳superscript𝒙topsubscript𝜽⋆superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇superscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡topsubscript𝜽⋆\displaystyle=\sum_{t=1}^{T}\max_{\bm{x}\in\mathcal{X}}\bm{x}^{\top}\bm{\theta% }_{\star}-\sum_{t=1}^{T}\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}\bm{\theta}_{\star}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x ∈ caligraphic_X end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_θ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤2⋅max⁡{1,Lλ}⋅β^T⁢(δ)⋅T⁢∑t=1Tmin⁡{1,‖𝒙t‖(𝑨^(t−1))−12}absent⋅⋅21𝐿𝜆subscript^𝛽𝑇𝛿𝑇superscriptsubscript𝑡1𝑇1superscriptsubscriptnormsubscript𝒙𝑡superscriptsuperscript^𝑨𝑡112\displaystyle\leq 2\cdot\max\left\{1,\frac{L}{\sqrt{\lambda}}\right\}\cdot\hat% {\beta}_{T}(\delta)\cdot\sqrt{T\sum_{t=1}^{T}\min\left\{1,\|\bm{x}_{t}\|_{% \left(\hat{\bm{A}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{-1}}^{2}\right\}}≤ 2 ⋅ roman_max { 1 , divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG end_ARG } ⋅ over^ start_ARG italic_β end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_δ ) ⋅ square-root start_ARG italic_T ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_min { 1 , ∥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG bold_italic_A end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } end_ARG

According to Theorem 2, we can bound the spectral error by error ϵitalic-ϵ\epsilonitalic_ϵ, which is
