where the last inequality holds because

hTsubscriptℎ𝑇\displaystyle h_{T}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑i=1BTσ¯i−∑i=1BTli⋅σ¯i2⁢lBTabsentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇subscript¯𝜎𝑖superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇⋅subscript𝑙𝑖subscript¯𝜎𝑖2subscript𝑙subscript𝐵𝑇\displaystyle=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}\overline{\sigma}_{i}-\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}% l_{i}\cdot\overline{\sigma}_{i}}{2l_{B_{T}}}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_l start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG
=∑i=1BT(1−2i−12BT)⋅σ¯iabsentsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇⋅1superscript2𝑖1superscript2subscript𝐵𝑇subscript¯𝜎𝑖\displaystyle=\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}\left(1-\frac{2^{i-1}}{2^{B_{T}}}\right)\cdot% \overline{\sigma}_{i}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - divide start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) ⋅ over¯ start_ARG italic_σ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
≤ϵ⋅∑i=1BT(1−2i−12BT)⋅12i=(1−2−BT2BT+1)⋅ϵabsent⋅italic-ϵsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑇⋅1superscript2𝑖1superscript2subscript𝐵𝑇1superscript2𝑖⋅12subscript𝐵𝑇superscript2subscript𝐵𝑇1italic-ϵ\displaystyle\leq\epsilon\cdot\sum_{i=1}^{B_{T}}\left(1-\frac{2^{i-1}}{2^{B_{T% }}}\right)\cdot\frac{1}{2^{i}}=\left(1-\frac{2-B_{T}}{2^{B_{T}+1}}\right)\cdot\epsilon≤ italic_ϵ ⋅ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 - divide start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) ⋅ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG = ( 1 - divide start_ARG 2 - italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) ⋅ italic_ϵ

Appendix G Properties of Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD

In this section, we highlight two significant properties of Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD that elucidate why the regret bound of DBSLinUCB using RFD is improved. Although Robust Frequent Directions for ridge regression have been studied by Luo et al. (2019), their theory is limited to single deterministic streaming sketches. We demonstrate that the decomposability of multi-scale sketching does not alter the properties of RFD.

We begin with the positive definite monotonicity of Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD, which ensures that the sequence of approximation matrices is per-step optimal.

Theorem 7 (Positive Definite Monotonicity).

At round t𝑡titalic_t, denote that the Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD provides a sketch 𝐒(t)superscript𝐒𝑡\bm{S}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have the following equation

(𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)+α(t)⁢𝑰⪰(𝑺(t−1))⊤⁢𝑺(t−1)+α(t−1)⁢𝑰.succeeds-or-equalssuperscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰superscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡1topsuperscript𝑺𝑡1superscript𝛼𝑡1𝑰\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t)}+\alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}\succeq\left(% \bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t-1)}+\alpha^{(t-1)}\bm{I}.( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I ⪰ ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I .
Proof.

Notice that α(t)⁢𝑰+(𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)=∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰superscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}+\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t)}=\sum_{i=1}^{B_% {t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where 𝑺i(t)superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the sketch matrix in block i𝑖iitalic_i and αi(t)superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡\alpha_{i}^{(t)}italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the adaptive regularization term of RFD at round t𝑡titalic_t.

Let 𝑸=[(𝑺Bt(t−1))⊤,𝒙t⊤]⊤𝑸superscriptsuperscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺subscript𝐵𝑡𝑡1topsuperscriptsubscript𝒙𝑡toptop\bm{Q}=\left[\left(\bm{S}_{B_{t}}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top},\bm{x}_{t}^{\top}% \right]^{\top}bold_italic_Q = [ ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, σtsubscript𝜎𝑡\sigma_{t}italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is the shrinking singular values of active block at round t𝑡titalic_t, the shrinking step of RFD provides

∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)+σt⁢𝑰⪰∑i=1Bt−1(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)+𝑸⊤⁢𝑸⪰∑i=1Bt−1(𝑺i(t−1))⊤⁢𝑺i(t−1).succeeds-or-equalssuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡subscript𝜎𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡superscript𝑸top𝑸succeeds-or-equalssuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^% {(t)}+\sigma_{t}\bm{I}\succeq\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}-1}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)% ^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}+\bm{Q}^{\top}\bm{Q}\succeq\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t-1}}\left(% \bm{S}_{i}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t-1)}.∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_I ⪰ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + bold_italic_Q start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_Q ⪰ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (32)

Therefore, for any unit vector 𝒂𝒂\bm{a}bold_italic_a, we have

𝒂⊤⁢((𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)+α(t)⁢𝑰−(𝑺(t−1))⊤⁢𝑺(t−1)+α(t−1)⁢𝑰)⁢𝒂superscript𝒂topsuperscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰superscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡1topsuperscript𝑺𝑡1superscript𝛼𝑡1𝑰𝒂\displaystyle\hphantom{{}={}}\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{% \top}\bm{S}^{(t)}+\alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}-\left(\bm{S}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^% {(t-1)}+\alpha^{(t-1)}\bm{I}\right)\bm{a}bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I - ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I ) bold_italic_a
=𝒂⊤⁢(∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)−∑i=1Bt−1αi(t−1)⁢𝑰−∑i=1Bt−1(𝑺i(t−1))⊤⁢𝑺i(t−1))⁢𝒂absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡1𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1𝒂\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}+\sum% _{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}-\sum_{i=1}^% {B_{t-1}}\alpha_{i}^{(t-1)}\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t-1}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t-1)}% \right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t-1)}\right)\bm{a}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a
=𝒂⊤⁢(∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)+σt⁢𝑰−∑i=1Bt−1(𝑺i(t−1))⊤⁢𝑺i(t−1))⁢𝒂absentsuperscript𝒂topsuperscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡subscript𝜎𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡1superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡1𝒂\displaystyle=\bm{a}^{\top}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}% \right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}+\sigma_{t}\bm{I}-\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t-1}}\left(\bm{% S}_{i}^{(t-1)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t-1)}\right)\bm{a}= bold_italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_I - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t - 1 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) bold_italic_a
≥0,absent0\displaystyle\geq 0,≥ 0 ,

which concludes the proof. ∎

Next, we prove that the sketch matrix produced by Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD is better conditioned than those produced by Dyadic Block Sketching for FD and the covariance matrix. In this context, the α𝛼\alphaitalic_α selected by RFD is optimal, as choosing a smaller α𝛼\alphaitalic_α would result in a worse condition number for the approximation matrices.

Theorem 8 (Well-Conditioned Property).

Let cond⁢(𝐗)=σmax⁢(𝐗)σmin⁢(𝐗)cond𝐗subscript𝜎𝐗subscript𝜎𝐗\textup{cond}(\bm{X})=\frac{\sigma_{\max}(\bm{X})}{\sigma_{\min}(\bm{X})}cond ( bold_italic_X ) = divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X ) end_ARG be the condition number of matrix 𝐗𝐗\bm{X}bold_italic_X. At round t𝑡titalic_t, denote that the Dyadic Block Sketching for RFD provides a sketch 𝐒(t)superscript𝐒𝑡\bm{S}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have

cond⁢((𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)+α(t)⁢𝑰+λ⁢𝑰)condsuperscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\textup{cond}\left(\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t)}+% \alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}+\lambda\bm{I}\right)cond ( ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + italic_λ bold_italic_I ) ≤cond⁢((𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)+λ⁢𝑰),absentcondsuperscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\leq\textup{cond}\left(\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t% )}+\lambda\bm{I}\right),≤ cond ( ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_λ bold_italic_I ) ,
cond⁢((𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)+α(t)⁢𝑰+λ⁢𝑰)condsuperscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\textup{cond}\left(\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t)}+% \alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}+\lambda\bm{I}\right)cond ( ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + italic_λ bold_italic_I ) ≤cond⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t+λ⁢𝑰).absentcondsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\leq\textup{cond}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}+\lambda\bm{I}% \right).≤ cond ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_λ bold_italic_I ) .
Proof.

Notice that α(t)⁢𝑰+(𝑺(t))⊤⁢𝑺(t)=∑i=1Btαi(t)⁢𝑰+∑i=1Bt(𝑺i(t))⊤⁢𝑺i(t)superscript𝛼𝑡𝑰superscriptsuperscript𝑺𝑡topsuperscript𝑺𝑡superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡𝑰superscriptsubscript𝑖1subscript𝐵𝑡superscriptsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡topsuperscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\alpha^{(t)}\bm{I}+\left(\bm{S}^{(t)}\right)^{\top}\bm{S}^{(t)}=\sum_{i=1}^{B_% {t}}\alpha_{i}^{(t)}\bm{I}+\sum_{i=1}^{B_{t}}\left(\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}\right)^{% \top}\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}italic_α start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_I + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where 𝑺i(t)superscriptsubscript𝑺𝑖𝑡\bm{S}_{i}^{(t)}bold_italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the sketch matrix in block i𝑖iitalic_i and αi(t)superscriptsubscript𝛼𝑖𝑡\alpha_{i}^{(t)}italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_t ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the adaptive regularization term of RFD at round t𝑡titalic_t. We have

≤σmax⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t)+λλabsentsubscript𝜎superscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝜆\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sigma_{\max}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}\right)+% \lambda}{\lambda}≤ divide start_ARG italic_σ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_λ end_ARG start_ARG italic_λ end_ARG
≤cond⁢(𝑿t⊤⁢𝑿t+λ⁢𝑰),absentcondsuperscriptsubscript𝑿𝑡topsubscript𝑿𝑡𝜆𝑰\displaystyle\leq\textup{cond}\left(\bm{X}_{t}^{\top}\bm{X}_{t}+\lambda\bm{I}% \right),≤ cond ( bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⊤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_λ bold_italic_I ) ,

which concludes the proof. ∎

Appendix H Open Access to Data

MNIST: http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/
